name: Catch Gems All
description:
"Catch GEMS all" is a game where you control a little dwarf who hoped in a hole, ready to catch as many gems as he can find. With his grapling hook, he's ready to collect every gems this cave has to offer !

HOW TO PLAY :
Click with your mouse on rocks to move on the map. You pick up gems while you're travelling from rock to rock. The deeper you go, the more gems there are ! Be sure to collect a lot of them before the timer run out !

Credits :

Programmer - Thomas Fossaert (Panzershrekk)
https://github.com/Panzershrekk

Artist - Solène Larcher (Sarielle)
https://www.artstation.com/sarielle
